prompts.name: Cover Letter Generation
prompts.prompt: Generate a professional cover letter based on the CV content and job description. Focus on relevant experience and skills.

prompts.name: Cover Letter Enhancement
prompts.prompt: Improve this existing cover letter to make it more compelling and professional.

prompts.name: Industry-Specific Cover Letter
prompts.prompt: Create a cover letter tailored specifically for the target industry, incorporating industry-specific language and requirements.
